commandbutton.name: Pause EVEBot
commandbutton.OnLeftClick: EVE:Execute[CmdStopShip] Script[EVEBot]:Pause Script[EVEBot].VariableScope.EVEBot:Pause Echo EVEBot: Paused

Text.name: MinimumDronesInBayText
Text.AutoTooltip: This will set the amount of drones you want in your drone bay.

Text.name: lblMaxRuntime
Text.AutoTooltip: The maximum time in hours to run the script before it aborts.

Text.name: lblIRCServer
Text.AutoTooltip: Enter an server address if you want to use IRC

Text.name: lblIRCChannel
Text.AutoTooltip: Enter an channel name if you want to use IRC

Text.name: lblIRCUser
Text.AutoTooltip: Enter an username if you want to use IRC

Text.name: lblIRCPassword
Text.AutoTooltip: Enter a password if you need one to use IRC

checkbox.Name: cbUseSound
checkbox.AutoTooltip: Enable audio events

checkbox.Name: cbDisable3D
checkbox.AutoTooltip: Disable EVE 3D Rendering

checkbox.Name: cbStripMine
checkbox.AutoTooltip: Strip Mine the immediate area to nothing before moving

checkbox.Name: cbBookMarkLastPosition
checkbox.AutoTooltip: Will bookmark the last mining location when the hold fills, and return to that spot after emptying the hold.

Text.name: MiningRangeMultiplerText
Text.AutoTooltip: Maximum slowboat distance is mining range * this

Text.name: lbCargoThreshold
Text.AutoTooltip: Cargo hold >= this value means cargo hold full

checkbox.Name: cbDistributeLasers
checkbox.AutoTooltip: When checked only one laser will be activated per locked asteroid. Uncheck to focus all lasers on a single asteroid. In general, this should be checked.

checkbox.Name: cbUseFieldBookmarks
checkbox.AutoTooltip: When checked the miner will warp to asteroid belt bookmarks instead of the belts themselves. See the labels Tab for bookmark prefix requirements.

checkbox.name: cbMiningDrones
checkbox.AutoTooltip: When checked mining drones will be used instead of combat drones

checkbox.name: cbOrcaMode
checkbox.AutoTooltip: When checked this will tell Evebot to operate an Orca, including managing boost modules

checkbox.name: cbOrcaWrecks
checkbox.AutoTooltip: When checked this will have your orca tractor and loot wrecks (Must have a tractor beam)

Text.name: AvoidPlayerRangeLabel
Text.AutoTooltip: Minimum distance we will keep other players at

checkbox.name: cbStandingDetection
checkbox.AutoTooltip: When checked you will move to another field when and if a player enters yours and is below the standing you set. (Doesn't Include Gang Members)

checkbox.Name: cbIceMining
checkbox.AutoTooltip: Check to mine ICE Fields instead of Asteroid Fields.

Textentry.name: MinimumSecurityStatus
Textentry.AutoTooltip: Move to another field when a player enters yours and is below the security status you set

Text.name: DeliveryLocationTypeText
Text.AutoTooltip: Type of the destination to delivery to, such as POS, Station, Outpost, etc

Text.name: DeliveryLocationText
Text.AutoTooltip: Either enter the delivery location here, or it will default to the last station we undock at

Text.name: PanicLocationLabel
Text.AutoTooltip: Station bookmark where you want to dock if something goes terribly wrong. Can be in a different system.

checkbox.name: cbAlwaysShieldBoost
checkbox.AutoTooltip: Turn Shield Booster on full-time, instead of on-demand.

checkbox.name: cbLaunchCombatDrones
checkbox.AutoTooltip: Launch and Use Combat Drones

checkbox.name: cbChainSpawns
checkbox.AutoTooltip: Will chain high value spawns if checked

checkbox.name: cbChainSolo
checkbox.AutoTooltip: If not checked chaining will be suspended if you are alone in a system.

checkbox.name: cbAnomalyAssistMode
checkbox.AutoTooltip: Keeps the ratter stationary, ignores belts and players

checkbox.name: cbReloadFromCan
checkbox.AutoTooltip: Warp to Ammo Bookmark to restock ammunition?

checkbox.name: cbOrbit
checkbox.AutoTooltip: Orbit the current NPC target?

checkbox.name: cbOrbitAtOptimal
checkbox.AutoTooltip: Attempt to calculate optimal?

checkbox.name: cbLootMyKills
checkbox.AutoTooltip: Loot the rats you kill

Text.name: MinimumDronesInSpaceText
Text.AutoTooltip: We will return to base when available drones falls below this number

Text.name: WarpRangeText
Text.AutoTooltip: What range to warp to belts at. Default is 0

Text.name: lblMinChainBounty
Text.AutoTooltip: NPC ships with a bounty above this value will be chained (if enabled).

Text.name: lblOrbitDistance
Text.AutoTooltip: Distance you want to orbit the current target

Text.name: lblAmmoTypeID
Text.AutoTooltip: Name of bookmark where the ammo can is located.

Text.name: lblRestockFreeSpace
Text.AutoTooltip: How much free space to leave in cargo after restocking ammo

checkbox.name: cbRunOnLowAmmo
checkbox.AutoTooltip: If checked, run to safe spot when low on ammo.

checkbox.name: cbRunOnLowCap
checkbox.AutoTooltip: If checked, run to safe spot when capacitor is empty.

checkbox.name: cbRunOnLowTank
checkbox.AutoTooltip: If checked, run to safe spot when tank (shield or armor) has failed.

checkbox.name: cbRunToStation
checkbox.AutoTooltip: If checked, run to a station instead of a safe-spot.

checkbox.name: cbUseWhiteList
checkbox.AutoTooltip: If checked, run to safe spot when any non-whitelisted pilot enters system.

checkbox.name: cbUseBlackList
checkbox.AutoTooltip: If checked, run to safe spot when any blacklisted pilot enters system.

Text.name: lblLowestStandingCombat
Text.AutoTooltip: The lowest standing pilot we tolerate in system before we flee. It goes to -11!

Text.name: MinArmorPctLabel
Text.AutoTooltip: Lowest armor percent allowed before fleeing

Text.name: MinShieldPctLabel
Text.AutoTooltip: Lowest Shield Pct Allowed before Running

Text.name: MinCapPctLabel
Text.AutoTooltip: Lowest capacitor percent allowed before fleeing

checkbox.name: cbBreaks
checkbox.Text: Take a break for hours every hours.
checkbox.AutoTooltip: If checked, will dock your ship at your panic location every for a break according to the information specified. Restart after changing these values.

checkbox.name: cbBreakBroadcast
checkbox.AutoTooltip: If checked, will broadcast break to all sessions.

checkbox.name: cbSafeCooldown
checkbox.Text: Wait minutes after unsafe pilots have left system
checkbox.AutoTooltip: If checked, will dock your ship at your panic location every for a break according to the information specified. Restart after changing these values.

checkbox.name: cbRunCourierMissions
checkbox.AutoTooltip: If checked, accept and complete courier missions.

checkbox.name: cbRunTradeMissions
checkbox.AutoTooltip: If checked, accept and complete trade missions.

checkbox.name: cbRunMiningMissions
checkbox.AutoTooltip: If checked, accept and complete mining missions.

checkbox.name: cbRunKillMissions
checkbox.AutoTooltip: If checked, accept and complete kill missions.

Text.name: lblSmallHauler
Text.AutoTooltip: Small Hauler (6000 m^3 or less).

Text.name: lblLargeHauler
Text.AutoTooltip: Large Hauler (more than 6000 m^3).

Text.name: lblMiningShip
Text.AutoTooltip: Mining Ship.

Text.name: lblCombatShip
Text.AutoTooltip: Combat Ship.

Text.name: lblSalvageMode
Text.AutoTooltip: Solo = switch to salvage ship. Relay = relay to salvage bot.

Text.name: lblSalvageShip
Text.AutoTooltip: Ship to use for solo salvaging.

checkbox.name: cbAvoidLowSec
checkbox.AutoTooltip: If checked, avoid missions that go into low-sec.

Text.name: lblSmallHaulerLimit
Text.AutoTooltip: Will use the large hauler for missions above this limit.

Text.name: MiningSystemLabel
Text.AutoTooltip: The bookmark name for the mining system location.

Text.name: HaulerPickupLabel
Text.AutoTooltip: The name of the fleet member flying your orca

Text.name: lblDestination
Text.AutoTooltip: The destination bookmark or station name.

Text.name: lblSourcePrefix
Text.AutoTooltip: The prefix for source bookmark names.

Text.name: lblRegionName
Text.AutoTooltip: Leave blank to service all regions.

Text.name: lblNote
Text.Text: NOTE: Only "Source and Destination" mode works at the moment. "Source and Destination" mode moves everything from stations who's bookmark begins with the source prefix to the destination station. "Asset Gather" mode moves all assets shown in the asset window to the destination station. You can optionally limit the freighter to a single system in this mode. "Move Minerals to Buyer" mode picks up minerals and moves them to the highest bidder's station. It does not sell the goods for you.

Text.name: SafeSpotsLabel
Text.AutoTooltip: The prefix for safe spot bookmark names.

Text.name: BeltBookMarkLabel
Text.AutoTooltip: The prefix for ore belt bookmark names.

Text.name: IceBeltBookMarkLabel
Text.AutoTooltip: The prefix for ice belt bookmark names.

Text.name: AmmoBookMarkLabel
Text.AutoTooltip: The prefix for Ammo bookmark names.

checkbox.name: cbUseFleet
checkbox.AutoTooltip: If checked, Evebot will manage your fleet

checkbox.name: cbIsLeader
checkbox.AutoTooltip: If checked, this character will invite your fleet. Don't set more than one!

Text.name: Label1
Text.AutoTooltip: Use this to add members to your fleet. They must be in your corporation or in your contacts list.

listbox.Name: FleetMembers
listbox.AutoTooltip: These characters will be added to your fleet if EVEBot can find them in your Corporation or Contacts and "I am Leader" is checked.
